attributes.action: Government to investigate the BBC over bias coverage against brexit
attributes.background:
Since the 2016 EU referendum the BBC as been bias against brexit on various news reports and tv programs . 
We ask the government to open up a independent investigation against the BBC

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations. 

You can find out how to make a complaint here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/

You could also start a new petition calling on the Government to establish new arrangements for the oversight of the BBC if that is something you would like to see happen.
